--- title: "pandas study" author: "Yoon Heejae" date: now categories: [study] --- ## 데이터 불러오기 ::: {#e8c30cf4 .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd df = pd.read_csv('bike_data.csv') df.head() df.shape df = df.astype({'datetime' : 'datetime64[ns]', 'weather' : 'int64', 'season' : 'object', 'workingday' : 'object', 'holiday' : 'object'}) ``` ::: ### 1번 문제 ::: {#63a9f19a .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} # 1번 df1 = df[df['season']==1] df1 df1['hour'] = df1['datetime'].dt.hour df1 max(df1.groupby('hour')['count'].sum()) # 13시 1417개 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` C:\Users\USER\AppData\Local\Temp\ipykernel_15348\1215149187.py:4: SettingWithCopyWarning: A value is trying to be set on a copy of a slice from a DataFrame. Try using .loc[row_indexer,col_indexer] = value instead See the caveats in the documentation: https://pandas.pydata.org/pandas-docs/stable/user_guide/indexing.html#returning-a-view-versus-a-copy df1['hour'] = df1['datetime'].dt.hour ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=26} ``` 1417 ``` ::: ::: ### 2번 문제 ::: {#8e7d5012 .cell execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} df.groupby('season')['count'].mean() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=27} ``` season 1 103.169811 2 218.803922 3 265.500000 4 218.581197 Name: count, dtype: float64 ``` ::: ::: ### 3번 문제 3번 특정 달(month) 동안의 총 대여량(count)을 구하시오. ::: {#d35d6d65 .cell execution_count=4} ``` {.python .cell-code} df['month'] = df['datetime'].dt.month df_jan = df[df['month'] == 1] df_jan['count'].sum() df['datetime'] ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=28} ``` 0 2011-09-05 17:00:00 1 2011-05-17 11:00:00 2 2011-11-10 09:00:00 3 2011-10-13 07:00:00 4 2011-10-15 14:00:00 ... 430 2011-04-07 16:00:00 431 2011-09-03 22:00:00 432 2011-11-12 22:00:00 433 2012-04-11 23:00:00 434 2012-01-06 09:00:00 Name: datetime, Length: 435, dtype: datetime64[ns] ``` ::: ::: ### 4번 가장 대여량이 많은 날짜를 구하시오. ::: {#33873f6b .cell execution_count=5} ``` {.python .cell-code} df['date'] = df['datetime'].dt.date a = df.groupby('date',as_index=False)[['count']].sum() a import numpy as np a max_idx = np.argmax(a['count']) a.iloc[max_idx,:] a.iloc[198,:] ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=29} ``` date 2012-05-11 count 1398 Name: 198, dtype: object ``` ::: ::: ### 5번 시간대(hour)별 평균 대여량(count)을 구하시오. ::: {#5314be2d .cell execution_count=6} ``` {.python .cell-code} df['hour'] = df['datetime'].dt.hour df.groupby('hour',as_index=False)[['count']].mean() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=30} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ### 6번 특정 요일(weekday) 동안의 총 대여량(count)을 구하시오. ::: {#96ac2fcb .cell execution_count=7} ``` {.python .cell-code} df['weekday'] = df['datetime'].dt.weekday df.groupby('weekday',as_index=False)['count'].sum() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=31} ```{=html}
weekday count

``` ::: ::: ### 7번 ::: {#4afed6f3 .cell execution_count=8} ``` {.python .cell-code} df df_melt = pd.melt(df,id_vars=['datetime','season',], value_vars=['casual','registered'], var_name='user_type', value_name='user_count') ``` ::: ### 8번 ::: {#298d639d .cell execution_count=9} ``` {.python .cell-code} df_melt.groupby(['season','user_type'])[['user_count']].mean().reset_index() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=33} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ### 9번로그 칼럼에서 숫자 정보만 추출하시오. ::: {#3de14a72 .cell execution_count=10} ``` {.python .cell-code} pd.set_option('display.max_columns', None) # 전체 칼럼 정보 프린트 옵션 df = pd.read_csv('logdata.csv') print(df.head(2)) df['숫자'] = df['로그'].str.findall(r'\d+') ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` 로그 0 2024-07-18 12:34:56 User: 홍길동 Action: Login ID... 1 2024-07-18 12:35:00 User: 김철수 Action: Purchase... ``` ::: ::: ### 10번로그 칼럼에서 모든 시간 정보를 추출하시오. ::: {#4ceab303 .cell execution_count=11} ``` {.python .cell-code} df['시간'] = df['로그'].str.extract(r'([\d]{2}:[\d]{2}:[\d]{2})') df ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=35} ```{=html}

Name: 제거, dtype: object ``` ::: ::: ### 13번# 13번 로그 칼럼에서 유저, Amount 값을 추출한 후 각 유저별 Amount의 평균값을 계산하시오. ::: {#bbf40f6f .cell execution_count=14} ``` {.python .cell-code} df df['숫자'] df['숫자'] def get_last_number(lst): if lst: # 리스트가 비어있지 않으면 return lst[-1] else: return None df['로그'] df['amount'] = df['로그'].str.findall(r'\d+').apply(get_last_number) df['amount'] type(df['amount'][0]) df['amount'] = df['amount'].astype(int) type(df['amount'][0]) ans = df.groupby('User',as_index=False)[['amount']].mean() ans.sort_values('User') # df['Amount'] = df['로그'].str.extract(r'Amount:\s*(\d+)').astype(float) df['Amount'] ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=38} ``` 0 NaN 1 2000.0 2 NaN 3 NaN 4 1500.0 5 NaN 6 3500.0 7 NaN 8 3000.0 9 NaN 10 NaN 11 4000.0 12 NaN 13 2500.0 14 NaN 15 4500.0 16 NaN 17 NaN 18 5000.0 19 NaN 20 5500.0 21 NaN 22 6000.0 23 NaN 24 NaN 25 6500.0 26 NaN 27 7000.0 28 NaN 29 7500.0 Name: Amount, dtype: float64 ``` ::: :::
